column2: SELECT g.objID, g.ra, g.dec, s.z as redshift, g.r, x.objID as dominantID INTO DR5_companion FROM DR5.Galaxy as g, DR5.SpecObjAll as s, DR5_LRGs_X as x WHERE x.objID! =g.objID and s.bestObjID = g.objID and g.redshift*#e5*sin (sqrt (power ((g.ra-x.ra) , #) +power ((g.dec-x.dec) , #) )) /#< # and abs (s.z-x.redshift) < # ORDER BY g.objID
